See Species goal for calculations.

These are the trend data for the species subgoal. These data describe changes in species condition within each region based on historical changes in risk status from IUCN Red List of Threatened Species [http://www.iucnredlist.org/](http://www.iucnredlist.org/)) [[@iucn2022 ; @iucn_spatial_2022; @birdlifeinternationalandhandbookofthebirdsoftheworld2020].
